attributes.action: To force MPs to hold a general election on the 12th of December 2019.
attributes.additional_details: We cannot go past another deadline.  Please sign this petition to show your support for a resolution in one form or another.
attributes.background: This petition is to highlight to MPs that the British people are sick and tired of the Westminster stalemate.  The Brexit crisis is ruining our countries reputation and economy.  Whether you are a remainer or a leaver, we need to bring this pantomime to an end and move forward in one form or another
